sentences.en: Brush the glaze over the top and sides of the hot cake.
sentences.cn: 在热蛋糕的顶上和周围刷上一层蛋浆。

sentences.en: brush up on your telephone skills.
sentences.cn: 温习一下你给人打电话的技巧。

sentences.en: Brush your teeth after each meal and floss daily.
sentences.cn: 餐后要刷牙，而且每天要使用牙线清洁牙缝。

sentences.en: Clean the mussels with a stiff brush under cold running water.
sentences.cn: 用一把硬刷子在冷自来水下冲洗贻贝。

sentences.en: Don't brush my hair up the wrong way; it hurts.
sentences.cn: 别把我的头发往上乱梳, 这样太疼了.

sentences.en: Don’t forget to brush your teeth.
He dipped the brush into the paint.
How often do you brush your teeth?
I gave it a quick brush with my hairbrush.
sentences.cn: 我用我的梳子把它迅速梳了一下。

sentences.en: I ran the brush through my hair and dashed out.
sentences.cn: 我用刷子刷了一下头发，冲了出去。

sentences.en: Once inside her apartment she felt an urge to brush her teeth.
sentences.cn: 一回到自己的公寓，她就有一种想要刷牙的冲动。

sentences.en: Paul asked Tara out to dinner but she gave him the brush-off .
sentences.cn: 保罗邀请塔拉外出吃饭，但遭到拒绝。

sentences.en: Perhaps you shouldn't brush the idea aside too hastily.
sentences.cn: 也许你不应该太仓促地否定这个想法。

sentences.en: Picking up a brush, Joanna parted her hair.
sentences.cn: 乔安娜拿起一把刷子，给头发分缝。

sentences.en: Take a sheet of filo pastry and brush it with melted butter.
sentences.cn: 取一张擀得很薄的油酥面皮，上面刷上一层熔化的牛油。

sentences.en: Thoroughly brush teeth and gums twice daily.
sentences.cn: 每天两次彻底刷净牙齿和牙龈.

sentences.en: Using a small brush, he brushed away the fine sawdust.
sentences.cn: 他用一把小刷子刷掉细锯末。
